----------------APP-------------- Physics Flakes Wallpaper Cancel
-------------RATE SCREEN---------------- Loving Physics Flakes? Rate us! Later No thanks Please consider giving us a\n5-star rating on the Play Store!
-----------ABOUT SCREEN--------- About
Email Us Rate on the Play Store Upgrade to the full version
-----------IMAGE PICKER--------------- Loading Gallery Apply Phone Gallery
-----------UNLOCK SCREEN--------------- Additional backgrounds Get 10+ gorgeous HD backgrounds - or choose an image from your own gallery!
Like having a snowglobe in your pocket… But way less awkward. Shake your phone to create a snow flurry!
Advanced settings Make your Physics Flakes as unique as a real snowflake. Change the number of snowflakes, the strength of gravity, and increase or decrease the flake quality
Auto-change backgrounds Keep it fresh, effortlessly! Set your background picture to change automatically as frequently as you want
